solution_line_template: There are {women_population} million women in Los Angeles because {total_population} / {women_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_population}/{women_fraction_denominator}={women_population}>>{women_population}
{women_in_retail} women work in retail because {women_population} x ({retail_fraction}) = <<{women_population}*({retail_fraction})={women_in_retail}>>{women_in_retail}
